content: I am looking at https://who-int.github.io/svc/refs/heads/rc2/StructureDefinition-svc-immunization.html - please let me know if I am looking at the wrong place!

(1) shouldn't authority be required? Being the slice selector
(2) shouldn't doseNumberPositiveInt and possibly seriesDosesPositiveInt be at least Must Support? Most of these vaccine are two doses and which dose you got seems a pretty important piece of information

On the other hand the VCI (US) profile _forbids_ dose numbers: http://build.fhir.org/ig/dvci/vaccine-credential-ig/branches/main/StructureDefinition-vaccination-credential-immunization.html#why-protocolapplied-is-not-allowed, so maybe not?
there are some complications on the dose number between the two use cases 'continuity of care' and 'proof of vaccination' in particular for travel. with RC2 we will have clarification on this.
for 1) yes, thanks for the callout on this.
pull requests are always welcome :-) , but we will get to it this weekend if not
(I never used Sushi so probably you do not really want _my_ pull requests!)
